actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_CORRBANK_DETAILS SET
CUSTOMER_BANK_CURRENCY_CODE = '{{selectCurrencyCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_NAME = '{{vayCrspBankNameCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO = '{{vayCrspBankAccountNoCopy.text}}',	
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM = '{{vayCrspBankReAccountNoCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ID_TYPE = '{{vayCrspBankClearingCodeCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_IBAN = '{{vayCrspBankIbanCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_SWIFTCODE = '{{vayCrspBankSwiftCodeCopyCopy.text}}'
  where OID ={{appsmith.store.editCurrentCorrbankOID}} and CUSTOMER_OID = {{appsmith.store.customerOID}} and CUSTOMER_SETTLEMENTBANK_OID = {{List1.selectedItem.OID}};
